alert.note: Alert for Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:12PM AKST until January 19 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Juneau, Haines, Haines Highway, and Gustavus. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow rates are expected Wednesday afternoon. Snow expected to change to rain Wednesday evening especially for Gustavus and Juneau.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
